name: Cuiyun Gao 0001
content: [ Cuiyun Gao @ HIT-SZ ] Cuiyun Gao Full Professor (校青年拔尖教授) PhD Supervisor (博导) School of Computer Science and Technology Harbin Institute of Technolgy, Shenzhen Email: Expertise: Software repository mining & Natural language understanding » EXPAND ALL SECTIONS COLLAPSE ALL SECTIONS Introduction Cuiyun Gao is a Full Professor of School of Computer Science and Technology at the Harbin Institute of Technolgy, Shenzhen. She used to be a Research Fellow at Nanyang Technology University (NTU), working with Prof. Yang Liu, and before that, a Postdoctoral Fellow in CUHK (The Chinese University of Hong Kong), working with Prof. Michael R. Lyu. She also received her PhD degree at CUHK, and graduated in end of 2018. During April~July of 2018, She was a visiting student in University College London (UCL), supervised by Prof. Mark Harman and Prof. Federica Sarro. Before coming to CUHK, She was one bachelor student of the Department of Communication Engineering of Shanghai University (SHU) in 2012~2014, under the supervision of Prof. Wanggen WAN. And before starting her engineering career, she joined Chien Wei-zang College (钱伟长学院) in 2010, an Honors College of SHU, and graduated from the College in 2012. Her primary research interests include AI + Software Engineering, particularly Large Language models; Source code understanding and analysis; User review analysis; Vulnerability detection; Mobile advertising analysis. 课题组招收研究生和博士生、博士后，欢迎对我的研究方向感兴趣的同学加入课题组，也非常欢迎对科研感兴趣且学有余力的本科生与我联系。 News News Tweets by @dmslcy Publications Publications Google Scholar DBLP 2025: FSE "Smaller but Better: Self-Paced Knowledge Distillation for Lightweight yet Effective LCMs.", Yujia Chen, Yang Ye, Zhongqi Li, Yuchi Ma, Cuiyun Gao*.
